title: Add Page Numbers to PDF | Footer & Header Numbering
description: Add page numbers to your PDF. Choose header/footer position, start number, template (Page {n} of {total}), font size, color, and margin.

openGraph.title: Add Page Numbers to PDF
openGraph.description: Number pages in your PDF with flexible templates and positions.

twitter.title: Add Page Numbers to PDF
twitter.description: Place page numbers with templates like Page {n} of {total}.

structuredData.name: Add Page Numbers to PDF
structuredData.description: Online tool to add page numbers to PDFs with customizable templates and positions.
